scripts.cordovaWTF: rm -rf cordova-app/plugins && rm -rf cordova-app/platforms && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add android && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add windows && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add ios && npm run-script dist
scripts.cordovaUpdate: npm update --save-dev node_modules/cordova && echo 'Local Dev Cordova Version:' && node_modules/.bin/cordova -v && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova-check-plugins
scripts.build-hard-android: npm run-script cordovaWTF && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova build android
scripts.run-android: echo NOTE: Must have build.json with key path, pass, alias, and aliasPass in your cordova-app dir && npm run-script dist && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova run android --release && adb logcat chromium:D SystemWebViewClient:D *:S
scripts.emulate-android: echo NOTE: Must have build.json with key path, pass, alias, and aliasPass in your cordova-app dir && npm run-script dist && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova run android --release --emulate --target=nexus4api19 && adb logcat chromium:D SystemWebViewClient:D *:S
scripts.run-android-previous: npm run-script dist && cd cordova-app && ../node_modules/.bin/cordova run android --nobuild && adb logcat chromium:D SystemWebViewClient:D *:S
